facts_text: Plaintiff claims defendant failed to return a borrowed laptop.
pleas_text: Defendant borrowed a laptop and has not returned it for 3 months despite multiple requests.
answer_text: Judgment for plaintiff. Defendant ordered to return laptop or pay equivalent value.

facts_text: Tenant suing for return of security deposit.
pleas_text: Landlord withheld security deposit claiming damages that were pre-existing.
answer_text: Judgment for plaintiff. Landlord failed to provide evidence of damages.

facts_text: Plaintiff claims breach of contract for web development services.
pleas_text: Paid 50% advance but developer delivered incomplete work and stopped responding.
answer_text: Judgment for defendant. Plaintiff failed to provide clear project specifications.
